snippet: "The Devil Inside," a horror movie acquired by Paramount Pictures for $1 million, has been a strong No. 1 at North American theaters over the weekend.
abstract: "The Devil Inside," a horror movie acquired by Paramount Pictures for $1 million, has been a strong No. 1 at North American theaters over the weekend.
lead_paragraph: An ultra-low budget, ultra-poorly reviewed horror movie, "The Devil Inside," kicked Tom Cruise out of the top slot at the North American box office over the weekend. "The Devil Inside," acquired by Paramount Pictures for $1 million, was a strong No. 1, taking in an estimated $34.5 million, according to Hollywood.com, which compiles box office data.

headline.main: 'The Devil Inside' Has a Low Budget but a Big Take
